statements: SELECT * FROM content_performance;
SELECT id, likes, views FROM content_performance;
SELECT content_id, comments, likes FROM content_performance;
SELECT likes, comments, views FROM content_performance;
SELECT * FROM content_performance WHERE views > 1000;
SELECT id, content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance WHERE views > 100 AND likes > 50 ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance WHERE comments > 20 ORDER BY comments DESC, views ASC
SELECT id, content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance WHERE content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY views ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance ORDER BY views DESC, likes ASC, comments DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT id, content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance WHERE views < 50 OR likes < 20 OR comments < 10 ORDER BY views ASC, likes DESC
SELECT * FROM content_performance;
SELECT content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM content_metadata WHERE date_published >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, likes FROM content_performance WHERE comments > 5;
SELECT content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance WHERE likes >= 100 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_performance WHERE views > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT content_id, title, author, date_published FROM content_metadata WHERE author = 'Alice' AND date_published > '2021-01-01';
SELECT content_id, views, likes, comments FROM content_performance WHERE views BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT content_id, title, author, date_published FROM content_metadata WHERE date_published < '2022-01-01' AND title LIKE '%Data Science%';

SELECT content_metadata.title, content_performance.likes FROM content_metadata JOIN content_performance ON content_metadata.content_id = content_performance.content_id WHERE content_performance.likes > 50;
SELECT * FROM views ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT likes_count, content_id FROM likes WHERE id > 100 AND likes_count > 50;
SELECT content_id, views_count FROM views WHERE views_count < 1000 ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(views_count) AS max_views FROM views;
SELECT content_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM views WHERE views_count > 100 ORDER BY views_count DESC
SELECT content_id, SUM(likes_count) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY content_id HAVING total_likes > 50
SELECT content_id, COUNT(id) AS comment_count FROM comments GROUP BY content_id ORDER BY comment_count DESC

SELECT views.id, views.content_id, likes.likes_count, comments.comment_text FROM views LEFT JOIN likes ON views.content_id = likes.content_id LEFT JOIN comments ON views.content_id = comments.content_id

SELECT views.id, views.views_count, likes.likes_count, comments.comment_text FROM views JOIN likes ON views.content_id = likes.content_id JOIN comments ON views.content_id = comments.content_id WHERE views.views_count > 50
SELECT * FROM content LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, url FROM content ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM content WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, count(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT c.title, c.url, COUNT(v.id) AS total_views FROM content c LEFT JOIN views v ON c.id = v.content_id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT * FROM views WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, user_id, view_timestamp FROM views WHERE content_id = '783fbe3a-a7c3-454e-ba2b-fe9939ff50ea' ORDER BY view_timestamp DESC;
SELECT content.title, comments.comment_text FROM content LEFT JOIN comments ON content.id = comments.content_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING like_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM content ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, content_id, views FROM content_views;
SELECT title, description FROM content_details WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT content_id, likes FROM content_likes ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT id, content_id, views, likes FROM content_performance WHERE views > 100 AND likes < 50;
SELECT * FROM content_comments WHERE content_id = 10;
SELECT id, views, likes FROM content_performance WHERE views > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, description FROM content_details WHERE title LIKE 'C%' AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, SUM(views) AS total_views FROM content_performance GROUP BY content_id HAVING total_views > 500 ORDER BY total_views DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, AVG(likes) AS avg_likes FROM content_likes GROUP BY content_id HAVING avg_likes > 50 ORDER BY avg_likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, MAX(comments) AS max_comments FROM content_performance GROUP BY content_id HAVING max_comments > 10 ORDER BY max_comments DESC LIMIT 5;
